thread.title: Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills Themed Baby Shower For Her Second Child
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills Themed Baby Shower For Her Second Child

title: Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills Themed Baby Shower For Her Second Child
text:
Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills Themed Baby Shower For Her Second Child Updated: Monday, October 26, 2015, 12:11 [IST] 
The KUWTK star, Kim Kardashian brought her sisters together for Beverly Hills theme based baby shower that was organized at Azoff house on Sunday 26 October, 2015. Kim threw this baby shower for her second child with the singer husband Kanye West, who is due to be born this December. 
All the Kardashian girls were clad in cute striped pajamas and sat by the camp. Khloe Kardashian was seen in her new hairdo. The rest of the ladies included Caitlyn Jenner, Kris Jenner, Gigi Hadid and other close friends. 
Image Courtesy : Instagram 
Kim's father Caitlyn Jenner (then Bruce Jenner) was spotted with ex-wife Kris Jenner walking towards the car, dressed in pajamas and smiling. Caitlyn had stayed aloof from the family when Lamar was critical. 
Read here to know more about Caitlyn in cinema theater while Lamar was critical.. 
Khloe who was by her ex-husband Lamar's side from the moment he was admitted to the hospital due to overdosing on herbal Viagra, left his side for the first time in 13 days and came out to attend Kim's baby shower. 
Read here to know more on Lamar's overdosing on herbal Viagra.. 
Reportedly, Kim's baby shower was due earlier, but she postponed it when Lamar's condition was critical as the whole family was by his side. Kim finally had the ceremony for her much awaited baby son who is speculated to be born on the Christmas Eve. 
Image Courtesy : Instagram 
Kyle Jenner, the youngest daughter of the family took to Instagram to post a picture with her elder sister Kourteny Kardashian, where they are both sitting by each other's side and sipping on hot chocolate. Kourteny shared the same image with her fans. 
While Kim's first child, North West had a big fat baby shower, which included a grand lunch for her celebrity guests and flowers worth thousands of dollars, KeeKee decided to make this one more exclusive, just to family and friends. 
The adorable 2-year-old North West was also dressed in pajamas for her yet to be born brother's baby shower. Kim's stomach was a little too big for the dress to hold it. The reality star managed to look stunning in her PJs. 
Actually, all of the Kardashian girls looked too good in their pajamas. Maybe, only the Kardashians are blessed with the talent that makes them look sexy in pajamas, too! Or it could be the hours of effort put in by their make-up artists and designers.
